data.title: Andy Williams
data.text:
AKA Howard Andrew Williams

Born: 3-Dec-1927

Birthplace: Wall Lake, IA

Died: 25-Sep-2012

Location of death: Branson, MO

Cause of death: Cancer - other

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Singer

Party Affiliation: Republican

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Moon River

In the 1970s, Timothy Leary advised Williams to try LSD. So he went to Canada and tripped four times over two days.

Father: (railway clerk)

Mother: (Welsh)

Brother: Bob

Brother: Don

Brother: Dick

Sister: Jane

Wife: Claudine Longet (dancer, m. 1961, div. 1975, one daughter, two sons)

Daughter: Noelle

Son: Christian

Son: Bobby

Wife: Debbie Haas (m. 1991)

John McCain 2008

McCain-Palin Victory 2008

McCain Victory Committee

Wedding: Arnold Schwarzenegger and Maria Shriver (1986)

Wedding: David Gest and Liza Minnelli (2002)

Welsh Ancestry Maternal

Risk Factors: LSD, Bladder Cancer

TELEVISION

The Tonight Show 1954-57

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

I'd Rather Be Rich (26-Aug-1964)

Official Website:

http://www.andywilliams.com/
